channel.title: Pico Workshop on
channel.description: Recent content in Pico Workshop on

item.title: 1. Intro to Pico-8
item.description: Intro We will be making visuals in Pico-8. It’s a fantasy console for making, sharing and playing tiny games and other computer programs.

item.title: 2. Getting started with Pico-8
item.description: ⭐️ In this tutorial we will learn how to use Pico-8! Boot and Navigate Open pico-8-edu.com and start trying out commands:

item.title: 3. Text, Lines, Shapes & Color
item.description: ⭐️ In this tutorial we will learn to draw simple shapes and colors~ ![[notes/images/zep_bear_tweetcart.gif]] bear tweetcart by zep.p8 (@URL)

item.title: 4. Animating with the Sin & Cos
item.description: ⭐️ In this tutorial we will learn how to use sin to create movement! ![[notes/images/carsonk_sin_waves.gif]] Sine Waves by Carson Kompon (@URL)

item.title: 5. Color by Position
item.description: ⭐️ In this tutorial we will learn how to create visuals by setting individual pixel colors~ ![[notes/images/colortyphoon_1.gif]] Color Typhoon by Trasevol_Dog (@URL)

item.title: 6. Particles
item.description: ⭐️ In this tutorial we will learn how to create visuals by updating a bunch of particles~ ![[notes/images/fireworks_1.gif]] Fireworks by Trasevol_Dog (@URL)

item.title: 7. Useful Pico-8 Features
item.description: ⭐️ In this tutorial we will learn some useful features that Pico-8 has~ Pal Change your color palette. https://pico-8.

item.title: 8. Study some Examples
item.description: ⭐️ In this tutorial we will analyze some cool examples to learn how they work~ TODO

item.title: About
item.description: This site is the homepage for the Creative Coding workshop held at TUMO Paris from Feb 27 to Mar 3 in 2023.

item.title: Examples
item.description: Tweetcarts! https://twitter.com/search?q=%23tweetcart https://museum-of-tweetcart-history.neocities.org/ Pico-8 Artists Munro’s Tweetcarts Game Dev Brook’s Tweetcarts @carsonk’s Pico-8 Art @alexthescott’sPico-8 Art @aebrer’s pico_galaxies

item.title: Our Creations
item.description: Visuals created during the workshop Students, add your work in the class drive under your name~ [[notes/OurCreations/content/wind.p8]] ![[notes/OurCreations/gifs/sourencho_wind_0.gif]]

item.title: Palette Maker
item.description: You can use this tool to make new palettes that you copy past at the top of your code. From https://www.
